Question: Q) What will be the value of x for given rectangle,here given perimeter is $22$ ?
Solution_text: --------------------------------------SOLUTION------------------------------------------- => perimeter of Rectangle = 2(length + breadth) => x = $8.0$ => ThereFore Option $1$ is right selection
